properties.Observatio: There are large trees at some places on both sides of the bank. But banks are eroded. Too much water flows in rainy season. In some places, waste have been dumped into streams, and in some places.
properties.Descript_1:
Paving available stone in the river banks and Planting trees

Dry rubble packing (with locally found rubble, size over 225mm )-Along the river banks

Vegetative cover improving around the  river bank with Areca nut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, Kumbuk/ M

properties.Observatio: There are trees at some places on both sides of the bank. However, the canal banks are subject to erosion due to the heavy flow of water during the rainy season. In some places, small amounts of garbage have been dumped into streams, and in some places,
